data.text: Kɨ Saionɨn nguibam bagh zurazurara Ekiam mɨkɨmvɨra ikɨtɨ,
Eghtɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba gantɨ, God Jerusalemɨn akurvagh suam, nɨ nan damazimɨn dera.
Jerusalem, nɨ atrivimɨn dapanir asuar kurkazir aghuiba itimɨn mɨn ikiam.
Eghtɨ gumazamiziba ua kamaghɨn nɨ dɨponan kogh suam,
Eghtɨ nɨn otariba nɨ inigh, nɨ ko deraghvɨra ikiam,
O Jerusalem, nɨn dɨvazir mɨtiar gavgavibar pɨn, kɨ apaniba bagha garir gumaziba afe,
Ia an dɨmvɨra ikɨ mangɨtɨ, a Jerusalem damightɨma,
Ikiavɨra Itir God akar dɨkɨrɨzim gami,
Nɨn gumazamizibara witɨn anigha gɨvaziba inigh bretbar ingarigh dar amam.
Ia oragh! Ikiavɨra Itir God, kamaghɨn nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba bar me mɨkemegha ghaze:
Me gumazamizir kaba kamaghɨn me dɨponam,
